about_the_game:
Inspired by Only Up and Getting over it.

When you climb up through sky.
You wish have something like Jetpack.
With jetpack, you hope climbing will be easy.

So, we'll give you a jetpack with full control.
Well, you can use Jetpack but it is way too heavy to walk. (with tiny fuel tank)
The only way to move up is use your jet pack!
Good Luck :D

■ Gameplay
just like other jump-based game climb to the top.
since you got jetpack you can travel further, some section of map needs faith of leap.
you cannot walk or run on surface but you can use boost to move faster.


■Characteristic
- use jetpack to climb across the map
- since you got jetpack gap between platform is really far
- careful that when you are in air, your jetpack engine is still using fuel
- need to perform some precision jumping skill.

■ massage from dev
I know you are gonna be so pro :)
i'm planning more update(content, map, debug, ect..)
localzation is planned(adding other language!)
I tested level myself that it is possible to reach to the top.
detailed_description:
Inspired by Only Up and Getting over it.

When you climb up through sky.
You wish have something like Jetpack.
With jetpack, you hope climbing will be easy.

So, we'll give you a jetpack with full control.
Well, you can use Jetpack but it is way too heavy to walk. (with tiny fuel tank)
The only way to move up is use your jet pack!
Good Luck :D

■ Gameplay
just like other jump-based game climb to the top.
since you got jetpack you can travel further, some section of map needs faith of leap.
you cannot walk or run on surface but you can use boost to move faster.


■Characteristic
- use jetpack to climb across the map
- since you got jetpack gap between platform is really far
- careful that when you are in air, your jetpack engine is still using fuel
- need to perform some precision jumping skill.

■ massage from dev
I know you are gonna be so pro :)
i'm planning more update(content, map, debug, ect..)
localzation is planned(adding other language!)
I tested level myself that it is possible to reach to the top.
name: Jet Up

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Window 7
  • Processor: intel i3-7000
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Jump with jetpack!. only you need to do is go up! the only thing you need is your skill!
